snippet: Gov. Mike Pence has added another 30 days to the needle program in Scott County, where a health emergency was declared linking the virus to intravenous use of the painkiller Opana.
abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence extends needle exchange program as number of HIV cases in Scott County, linked to intravenous use of prescription painkiller Opana, continues to grow.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mike Pence has added another 30 days to the needle program in Scott County, where a health emergency was declared linking the virus to intravenous use of the painkiller Opana.

headline.main: H.I.V. Cases Lead Indiana to Extend Needle Exchanges
headline.print_headline: H.I.V. Cases Lead Indiana to Extend Needle Exchanges
